        public NBA2DRA(Options_Safra options,
               boolean detailedStates)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        options - Options_Safra specifying whether to stutter, etc...
        detailedStates - generate detailed descriptions for the states?
        stutter_information - Information about the symbols that may be stuttered

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public DRA convert(NBA nba,
                   int limit)
            throws PrismException
        Convert an NBA to an DRA (having APElements as edge labels). Throws LimitReachedException if a limit is set (>0) and there are more states in the generated DRA than the limit.
        Parameters:
        nba - the NBA
        dra_result - the DRA where the result is stored (has to have same APSet as the nba)
        limit - a limit for the number of states (0 disables the limit).
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • convert_safra

        public DRA convert_safra(NBA nba,
                         int limit)
                  throws PrismException
        Convert the NBA to a DRA using Safra's algorithm
        Parameters:
        nba - the NBA
        dra_result - the result DRA
        limit - limit for the size of the DRA
        Throws:
        PrismException
